wikipedia_page.main: Gareth Hopkins (born 14 June 1980) is an English football striker who plays for Bishop's Cleeve.

response: Gareth Hopkins returned to the international scene playing two matches in the Chappell–Hadlee one day series. The second match of the series and Hopkins' first was heavily rain affected, New Zealand reaching 3/30 when the game came to a close. The second and final match was won by Australia by a convincing 114 runs, Hopkins contributing 9 off 17 balls.
